SEE ALSO Full documentation <https://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/shuf> or available locally via: info '(coreutils) shuf invocation'
DESCRIPTION: Write a random permutation of the input lines to standard output.
With no FILE, or when FILE is -, read standard input.
Mandatory arguments to long options are mandatory for short options too.
-e, --echo treat each ARG as an input line
-i, --input-range=LO-HI treat each number LO through HI as an input line
-o, --output=FILE write result to FILE instead of standard output
-z, --zero-terminated line delimiter is NUL, not newline
NAME: shuf - generate random permutations
